dialogues.text: You find an ancient pocket watch in your grandfather's attic. Upon winding it, you suddenly find yourself in the past—decades before you were born.

choices.text: Explore the past and learn about your ancestors
Try to fix the clock and return to the present

dialogues.text: You meet your great-grandparents, but they don't recognize you. You quickly realize you could change history by interacting with them.

choices.text: Tell them who you are and warn them about the future
Stay quiet and observe their lives

dialogues.text: You accidentally change something small in history—a decision your great-grandfather makes—causing ripples in the timeline.

choices.text: Accept that things may never be the same again

dialogues.text: After a tense journey to fix the timeline, you finally manage to return to your own time. But something feels off...

choices.text: Investigate the changes in the present
Live with the changes and never look back

dialogues.text: You discover that your actions in the past have had disastrous consequences in the present. You regret ever touching the watch.
